sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import "../styles/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import calculateAvgRating from "./../utils/avgRating"; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const reviewMsgRef = useRef(""); const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null); //this is an static data letter we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); //destracture properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); //format date const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; // submit request to the server const submitHandler = e=>{ e.preventDefa } return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/ person {distance}k/m {maxGroupSize} People
Description

{desc}

{/* ==================tour reviews section start=================== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews )

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{reviews?.map((review, index) => (
Ananta

{new Date("04-22-2025").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing tour.
))}
{/* ==================tour reviews section end=================== */}
); }; export default TourDetails;
